summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Seedling self-reflection platform. Frontend-only React app working well with minor clipboard permission issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Clipboard API permission denied error when copying challenge summary
ui_bugs.details: Browser security prevents clipboard access without proper HTTPS context or user gesture. Error overlay blocks further interactions.

passed_tests: Home page loads with proper design and branding
Language toggle switches between EN/HI/TE correctly
Start Assessment button navigates to assessment page
Assessment displays 10 questions with 4-point scale options
Progress bar updates correctly during assessment
Back navigation works during assessment
Assessment automatically navigates to results after 10 questions
Results page shows primary and secondary styles correctly
Results page displays strengths, watch-outs, patterns, and next steps
Try Micro-Challenge button navigates to challenges page
Challenges page shows all 3 challenge options (Cyber, Focus, Civic)
Challenge selection and response input works correctly
Challenge submission generates summary successfully
Navigation back to results from challenges works
Restart button clears assessment and returns to home
Language persistence works across page navigation via localStorage
All interactive elements have proper data-testids
Scoring algorithm calculates primary/secondary styles correctly
Design system with earthy green colors and rounded elements working
Multi-language support (EN/HI/TE) fully functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix clipboard API permission error by implementing fallback copy mechanism or using a different approach for the copy summary functionality. Consider using a modal with selectable text or download functionality instead of direct clipboard access.
